sentences.en: A witness in court is obligated to tell the truth.
sentences.cn: 证人在法庭上有义务讲清事实真象.

sentences.en: All three medalists were obligated to participate in a post - match press meeting.
sentences.cn: 三位获奖选手都必须参加赛后新闻发布会.

sentences.en: Citizens are obligated to defend their interests and that of the state.
sentences.cn: 自觉维护祖国和人民的利益是每个公民应尽的义务.
他觉得有责任予以帮助.

sentences.en: He had got a girl pregnant and felt obligated to her and the child.
sentences.cn: 他让一个姑娘怀孕了，他觉得自己有义务照顾她和孩子。

sentences.en: I felt obligated to let him read the letter.
sentences.cn: 我觉得有义务让他看到这封信。

sentences.en: In a bulk of cases neitIT party is obligated to provide insurance.
sentences.cn: 在许多情况下,任何一方都么有办理保险的义务.

sentences.en: Member States are obligated to carry them out.
sentences.cn: 各会员国必须执行这些决定.

sentences.en: Normally, the seller is obligated to prepay the ocean freight.
sentences.cn: 通常情况下, 卖方有义务预付海运费.

sentences.en: Only the seller of the option is obligated to perform.
sentences.cn: 而卖方则必须根据买方要求履行期权合约.

sentences.en: The only people obligated to disclose their track records are money managers.
sentences.cn: 只有基金经理才会被要求公开交易记录.

sentences.en: The principal may be obligated as if it had expressly granted the authority to agent.
sentences.cn: 被代理人可能要承担他原本未明确授权给代理人之责任.

sentences.en: Under a separation agreement, he was obligated to pay his ex-wife £50,000 a year for life.
sentences.cn: 根据分居协议，他必须每年向前妻支付5万英镑。

sentences.en: We were obligated to attend the opening ceremony.
sentences.cn: 我们有必要参加开幕式.

sentences.en: You must feel obligated to him for his help.
sentences.cn: 你必须对他的帮助表示感激.

words.tran_cn: 有责任的，有义务的；必需的
义务的；必须的；义不容辞的
必须的；感激的；有责任的
乐于助人的；有礼貌的；体贴的；亲切的
要求；约束；施恩惠（oblige的过去分词）
使负义务；强使，强迫；对…施以恩惠
迫使；强制；赐，施恩惠；责成

trans.tran_cn: 有义务的，必须的，有责任的
trans.tran_en: If you feel obligated to do something, you feel that it is your duty to do it. If you are obligated to someone, you feel that it is your duty to take care of them.

trans.tran_cn: 使负有责任或义务（ obligate的过去式和过去分词 ）
